data.name: Unawake
data.detailed_description:
After the First Rebellion; the Fallen Angels were defeated. The Unawakens continued the eternal war between the heaven and the Earth...



In 2016, a mysterious dig site was surfaced in the ancient city of Tarsus. A dig site in the middle of the city with special forces and intelligence agents protecting the area, it drove people's curiosity to maximum. But alas, no information was given to the public. There were lots of theories... But the truth was so much darker...

You are an archeology intern who was being trained specifically to enter the dig site for months. And when you finally descend to the madness of the ancient site, your reality is altered, forever.

Unawakens is an FPS melee game which you fight your way through with various close combat medieval weapons. Although you have a bow and arrow, you'll have to be very careful in using it as the world doesn't have too much arrows!

Features

- Both fast and tactical first person melee combat.

- Story based game progression.

- Richly designed, breathtaking 12 surreal levels.

- Experience based character and skill progression.

- More than 20 skills to customize your way of play.

- Crafting and Socketed Items systems to customize every item in the game.

- 10 weapons with more than 100 customization options with crafting. You have a lightning enchantment stone? Alright, plug it in to your sword to give lightning damage! The gameplay and visuals will change as you craft your items.

- An epic story which combines science fiction, fantasy and history together.

data.short_description: Unawakens is a melee first person action adventure game in a surreal realm which combines ancient history and fantasy together. Live your journey beyond the battlefields of the Fallen Angels and the giant Unawakens. The Eternal War continues!
